titles.title: Rural Upgrades for Road Access and Local Growth Act of 2025
Rural Upgrades for Road Access and Local Growth Act of 2025

To amend section 173 of title 23, United States Code, to require the Secretary of Transportation to set aside certain amounts provided under the rural surface transportation grant program for regional hubs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
